page.title: 02A Day's Food
page.content: A Days Food Monday June 3rd 1985. For breakfast I had grilled bacon,fried bread and fried egg.I had a drink of water. For break I had a packet of salt and vinegar crisps. For lunch I had four cheese sandwiches in white bread.One small tomato and a drink of orange squash. When I got home I had a drink of lemon squash and a biscuit. I had an ice lolly while shopping. For tea I had 2 beefburgers,a mixed salad consisting of lettuce,tomato, cucumber,celery,radish and chives.New potatoes boiled in their skins, flavoured with fresh mint,with no salt added.Homemade wholemeal roll,fresh fruit salad and a drink of water. For supper I had a crumpet and jam. Emma Griffiths aged 11.
